name: Time Travel Game
description:
This is a 3D 3rd person adventure game where the player has the ability to move forward and backward through time. The game takes place in a small town where everyone in the town has a set schedule. The player's actions will change the schedule of those characters.

Controls:

  • Walk Forward: W
  • Turn Right (while walking): A
  • Turn Left (while walking): D
  • Interact: E

Using some temporary assets from Unity 3d Asset store:

  • Fishing Boat
  • Low Poly Cartoon Cars
  • Medieval Toon House
  • Medieval Toon Character
  • Low Poly Nature Pack
